DOC.criteria: The participant must give his/her inform sign consent The participant must insure beneficiary health insurance plan Inclusion criterion patient venous insufficiency group : CEAP ( ClinicalEtiologyAnatomyPathophysiology ) Classification : C1S , C3 C5 Inclusion criterion healthy volunteer general good health subgroup include : sedentary volunteer ( < 2hours physical activity per week ) active volunteer ( 2 6 hour physical activity per week ) athletic volunteer ( 6 hour physical activity per week least 1 year ) The participant participate another study , except `` volumetric '' counterpart present study The participant exclusion period determine previous study The participant judicial protection , tutorship curatorship The participant refuse sign consent It impossible correctly inform participant The participant pregnant , parturient , breastfeed Arterial vascular disease , heart , lymph , renal , hepatic , oncologic , metabolic endocrine condition may cause exaggerate edema Exclusion criterion healthy volunteer : Risk abnormal bleed ( hemophilia , anticoagulation antiplatelet ) Taking diuretic corticoid
